title: The Corporate S*ave has Gained the 『Appraisal』 Skill - Novel Updates
author: Kono Cha   This Tea   この茶
description: Tanaka, a corporate slave, works at the KUROI corporation. While going to work one morning, he helps a girl who’s about to be run over by a car. However, after waking up, before him was a beautiful woman who called herself a goddess. She said, she would give him an ability and take him to a different world. But, he miraculously revives…>
